points_of_interest.name: Catedral de Culiacán
points_of_interest.description: The Cathedral of Culiacán is a historic Catholic church built in the neoclassical style. It stands as one of the most important religious monuments in the city, featuring beautiful architecture and ornate interior decorations.

points_of_interest.name: Jardín Botánico Culiacán
points_of_interest.address: Av. las Americas 2251, Country Tres Ríos, 80030 Culiacán, Sinaloa
points_of_interest.description: The Culiacán Botanical Garden spans over 10 hectares featuring a remarkable collection of native and exotic plants. It also houses contemporary art installations throughout its grounds, making it a perfect blend of nature and culture.

points_of_interest.name: Mercado Garmendia
points_of_interest.address: Blvd. Niños Héroes 965, Garmendia, 80129 Culiacán, Sinaloa
points_of_interest.description: This traditional market offers an authentic glimpse into local culture where you can find fresh regional produce, spices, traditional crafts, and sample local cuisine. It's a vibrant hub of daily life in Culiacán.

points_of_interest.name: Parque Las Riberas
points_of_interest.address: Blvd. Pedro Infante, Country Tres Ríos, 80030 Culiacán, Sinaloa
points_of_interest.description: A beautiful riverside park extending along the Tamazula River offering recreation areas, walking and cycling paths, sports facilities, and picnic areas. It's a popular spot for families and fitness enthusiasts.

points_of_interest.name: Museo de Arte de Sinaloa
points_of_interest.address: Av. Ángel Flores 1705, Centro, 80000 Culiacán, Sinaloa
points_of_interest.description: The Sinaloa Art Museum (MASIN) is housed in a beautifully restored 19th-century building. It features permanent and rotating exhibitions of contemporary art, with a focus on Mexican artists and particularly those from Sinaloa.

points_of_interest.name: Zoológico de Culiacán
points_of_interest.address: Blvd. Pedro Infante, Country Tres Ríos, 80030 Culiacán, Sinaloa
points_of_interest.description: The Culiacán Zoo is home to over 400 animals from 100 different species. It offers educational experiences about wildlife conservation while providing a fun day out for visitors of all ages.

points_of_interest.name: Estadio Tomateros
points_of_interest.address: Avenida Jesús Andrade S/N, Miguel Alemán, 80200 Culiacán, Sinaloa
points_of_interest.description: Home to los Tomateros de Culiacán, this modern stadium can accommodate over 20,000 spectators. It hosts exciting sporting events and serves as a venue for other large-scale entertainment activities.

points_of_interest.name: Parroquia de Nuestra Señora de Guadalupe
points_of_interest.description: This is a church that is dedicated to the Virgin of Guadalupe. It is a beautiful church that is worth visiting.
